names.english: increase the fluids and order the qi decoction
names.commonEnglish: Increase the Fluids and Order the Qi Decoction

actions: Clears Heat, cools the Blood, and nourishes Yin.
With Sheng Di Huang, for Excess or Deficiency Heat patterns.
With Sheng Di Huang and Mai Men Dong, for constipation due to Dryness and sore, dry throat due to Deficiency Fire.
Moistens the Lungs, nourishes Yin, nourishes Stomach Yin, generates fluids and moistens the Intestines.
With Sheng Di Huang, for hematemesis or epistaxis due to Yin Deficiency with Excess Heat.
Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin and generates fluids.
With Da Huang, for Blazing Heart and Stomach Fire with epistaxis, and hemoptysis, Deficiency Fire and parched, dry stools with damaged Yin.
Drains Heat, purges accumulations, drains Fire and drains Heat from the Blood.
With Mai Men Dong, Xuan Shen and Sheng Di Huang, for constipation with Heat consuming Body Fluids.
Purges accumulations, guides out Stagnation, softens hardness, moistens Dryness, clears Heat and drains Fire.
With Da Huang, for constipation due to Heat in the Stomach and Intestines.

syndromes: Yin Deficiency constipation which has not responded to Zeng Ye Tang

symptoms: Dry stools that cannot easily be expelled, even with purgatives
Distention and fullness of the epigastrium and abdomen
manifestations.tongueCoat: Little or None or thin and yellow or Burnt and yellow
manifestations.pulse: Thready and slightly rapid or weak and forceless

conditions.name: Foundation of formulas to treat oral side effects of radiation

contraindications: Use only for constipation due to Yin Deficiency combined with dry stool in the Intestines.

modifications.purpose: postpartum anuria with fever caused by infection
reducing the side effects of phenothiazine-induced constipation
